name: Instagram as Progressive Web App
manifest_description: name: is long name on app(e.g. on splashscreen) | short_name: short name of app (e.g below icon) | start_url: which page load on startup | scope: '.' which pages are included in PWA Experience(dot means all routes)  | display:  means how it should look like(standalone means without address bar / fullscreen = any control shows / minimal-ui = reduce ui elements / browser = like browser itself) | background_color: color of whilst loading & on Splashscreen | theme_color: (e.g on top bar in task switcher) | description: what is your app | dir: direction of your app | lang: main language of app | orientation: of your app | icons: config icons(e.g on homescreen) | related_applications: navite apps that are your apps on store
